title: Interpretation of following, chasing, and catching up with someone in a dream, someone following me in a dream

preview.html: Seeing someone following you for a single girl married to a pregnant woman Seeing an old woman, an unknown person, or a well-known person chasing you or following you according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of hunting in a dream. Whoever dreams that an unknown person is following him slowly and quietly, this indicates something in the dreamer’s life that is unsuspecting and makes his life stressful. Perhaps there are animals or Humans in his environment frighten him, especially if the dreamer is frightened or frightened. The longer the distance, the longer the suffering will last and the shorter the distance, the closer to the gulf. If the dreamer encounters someone following him in the dream, he will be better off and will be able to find what interests him in reality. Seeing someone following you with eyes only This indicates the presence of someone in your environment who is looking into your news and circumstances, and this could be good or bad, depending on the context of the dream, as well as the dreamer’s condition. While awake. Anyone who sees as if a familiar person is near the dreamer, the dream may indicate that this person may be investigating, monitoring, or wanting information about the dreamer. Seeing a celebrity following you in a dream depends on his status. And if he is a legal person. You ignore your religion, but if he is famous in art and singing, you may be exposed to temptation and hatred. If you see a woman following you in a dream, then this symbol is related to its interpretation or not to the dreamer’s gender, male or female, then the status of the woman following you is known and unknown, as well as small. Or big. If a woman sees in her dream a familiar woman in her environment, she follows behind her slowly or even with her looks and wants good for her. This indicates that the dreamer is trying to avoid some people around her and may regret not participating in something. But if the woman wants evil with her or looks at her with malicious eyes, then she may be an enemy dominated by malice and malice. If she sees an unknown woman following her, then she is an enemy and may indicate Danger from the dreamer. It is undesirable for a woman to be followed by an old woman, as it is a bad omen and may indicate poverty or stumbling. For men, this sign can sometimes be good, especially if the woman following you is a beautiful young woman. While if the woman Old woman, it means lack of money or running out and you are in trouble. A famous woman is according to her status, so if she is known it can be a reference to events related to women living in your environment, and it can be a temptation or a ritual. As for famous celebrities, they are often not good, Especially if they are in a forbidden area. Interpretation of hunting in a dream. The dream of hunting and chasing is considered one of the most common and recurring dreams among people, and it is a dream motivated by fear, fear, or fright. Hunting in a dream can be shaped by different scenes and symbols, and wild and predatory animals are among the most common symbols that You hunt or chase us in a dream, followed by people such as criminals, thieves, thugs, and thieves. Interpretation of being chased in a dream: Being chased by a fearful person or thing: You feel extremely threatened by one of the external factors affecting your life. This factor could also be a dark emotion controlling you.TV

title: Interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream is one of the most promising visions that make dreamers feel psychological comfort, especially since the Virgin Mary is one of the women who are very beloved by Muslims, as she is the mother of the Messenger Jesus - peace be upon him - so the dream of the Virgin Mary always brings peace and we will try to find some interpretations of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream with Ibn Sirin, but as always we emphasize that the interpretations that will be presented cannot be inferred for any other dream, because the interpretation of the dream requires sitting in front of a reliable interpreter. Who knows all the circumstances surrounding the dreamer and can get answers to all the required questions. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dreamIbn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream indicates good morals, purity and chastity. The appearance of the Virgin Mary in a dream is a sign that the dreamer has wisdom, balance and good judgment. In addition, dreaming of the Virgin Mary can be a harbinger of abundance in livelihood and ease of situation. After all, dreaming of the Virgin Mary always indicates stability in life. Read also: Backgrounds in a dreamSeeing the Virgin in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen says that the interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream is good news in getting rid of the problems that the dreamer suffers from and removing difficulties and obstacles. Also, dreaming of the Virgin can be a sign of the dreamer's righteousness, piety to God, closeness to Him, and a commandment of goodness. In addition to the fact that Ibn Shaheen believes that when a woman dreams that she does not give birth to the Virgin Mary, this may be good news in that she will have good offspring, God willing. Read also: Holding a friend's hand in a dreamSeeing the Virgin Mary in a dream For men, the interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for a man indicates that he is one of the loyal figures who works to establish worship in the most complete way possible and God. Just like the appearance of the Virgin Mary in a man's dream, this may be good news to ease the situation and meet his needs and interests. In addition to the fact that the person who sees the Virgin Mary in a dream, this may be good news to settle debts, relieve anxiety and relieve distress. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a single woman's dream The interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for an unmarried girl may be an omen for that girl that she will get married, God willing, soon. The unmarried girl who sees the Virgin Mary in a dream gives good news that she will be able to achieve all the goals she seeks and tries to achieve. In addition, the appearance of the Virgin Mary in the dream of an unmarried girl is a sign of that girl's happiness and righteousness. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for a married woman The interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for a married woman indicates that this woman has good behavior and good morals. Likewise, for a married woman who sees the Virgin Mary in a dream, this can be a sign of

title: Interpretation of seeing cakes in a dream and its meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cake being eaten in a dream. This vision is considered one of the praiseworthy visions, and it is good news for the one who sees the dream. Interpreters explain these interpretations perfectly, and along these lines, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing eating cake in a dream.Interpretation of seeing eating cake in a dream, as cake is considered one of the delicious meals that many people prefer, whether adults or children, and seeing it in a dream is considered a positive vision. The good ones include many good interpretations and meanings, and in this context we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing eating cake in a dream. It is also: Eating cake in a dream is a sign that you will hear happy news. If a married woman dreams that she is eating cake, this means that she will enjoy stability and happiness in her life. Marriage. Whereas if an unmarried girl or an unmarried young man sees a cake in a dream, this is evidence of the approaching marriage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is eating a cake. It is a sign of the end of sorrows and worries, and the approach of happiness and comfort. Seeing him eating Cake is a sign of success and success in life, work or study, and it also shows that the dreamer has obtained the highest academic degrees, academic ranks or high positions. If a pink or strawberry cake appears to a girl or boy. And also if someone is seen eating a chocolate cake, Or a brown cake, and God is Most High and knows it. This dream is a sign of success in business, improved economic conditions and also shows the success of trade for the merchant. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the higher interpreters for married and single women. Interpretation of a dream about eating cake for a single woman. In a dream for an unmarried girl, This vision includes a group of interpretations, as it is a harbinger of goodness and happiness, and it also varies based on those details that we see in the dream, and in this paragraph we will explain. The interpretation of a dream about eating a cake for a single woman is also: In the event that an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating white cakes. This dream is evidence that the girl will achieve what she wants. But if he sees that he is eating a fruit pie, this is a sign that he is hearing good news. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating a brown cake or a chocolate cake, this is evidence that the date of this girl’s marriage to a good man is near, God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing robes in a dream, by Ibn Sirin, for married and single women. Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate cake for a married woman, as the interpretations contained in these dreams differ from each other, based on the type of cake that you see in the dream and the social status of the dreamer, and in this context you will We explain the interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate cake for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is eating a white cake, this dream is evidence that this woman is living a happy married life in which she feels safe and stable. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is eating a brown cake, this indicates that He will get what he wants, and it also indicates a change in q

title: The 50 most important interpretations of electricity in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about electricity in a dream: It is known that all people are very afraid of electricity, as it may lead to death when they touch it in reality. Therefore, we find that dreaming about it is a frightening thing, and for this reason we will learn for ourselves the interpretation of a dream about electricity in a dream and what it expresses by following our detailed article. Interpretation of a dream about electricity in a dream. The vision refers to Important associations, such as: Something bad happened to this person that made him sad in his life. This may indicate the need to be very careful in his steps in order to avoid any harm that may befall him, as he may take a wrong step that will affect him in the future. The dream shows that there is someone who does not treat him honestly and this Hypocrisy makes them conspire against him without his knowledge, and this makes him suffer a lot and he is unable to overcome this ordeal in his life. Interpretation of seeing electricity in a dream by Ibn Sirin Our great imam, Ibn Sirin, explains to us all the meanings of this vision: The dreamer achieves all his ambitions in life, and excels in them, and this makes him achieve himself to A large extent without anyone controlling it. If the dreamer sees a large spark coming out of it in his dream, this confirms that he is surrounded by many enemies around him. When you see wires in a dream, this is a clear sign of the existence of a major problem and harm will occur to the dreamer, but if he stays away from them and gets rid of them permanently This is evidence of the end of what hurt him. Life and cure him of all fatigue. When you see this dream in the house of a sick man, it shows a bad sign for that man, which may be his death. If one sees that he was injured as a result of being exposed to it in a dream, this indicates that there are difficulties that affect him and fill his life with sadness. Interpretation of a dream about electricity in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. We find that Imam Al-Sadiq has interpretations and evidence for this dream, as he says: A strong desire to make his life go for the better. The dreamer is thinking about repenting for all the sins he has lived and committed in his life. If the dreamer wants to shock someone close to him, such as his father, This is not a bad dream, rather it expresses his desire to know some solutions to an issue that concerns him and worries him a lot. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about electricity in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi tells us about the meanings of this dream, which are: If he sees himself using it To harm those around him in a dream, this confirms that he is a bad person and faces great injustice with everyone he knows, and this dream is a warning of the necessity of staying away from this control. And the injustice that inflicts on him in his life. But if he saw that someone was trying to harm him through her in the dream, then this is clear evidence that he was treated unfairly in his life because of that person. When the dreamer sees that he is trying to keep her away from a group of people, this indicates that he is facing all the crises that She waits for him in life without anything happening to him. If the dreamer sees that it affects the transplant, this confirms that there are many problems being presented to the owners of the transplant, and this will spoil their lives. If in a dream he is affected by an electric shock from it, then this is a warning that his death is approaching. Electricity in a single woman’s dream. When a girl sees this dream, she expects many negative things in her life, so we find that

title: Interpretation of eating fish in a dream

preview.html: Seeing fish in a dream has many different interpretations, which vary depending on the situation in which the fish is seen, and in this article we will show you all the possible interpretations about seeing fish in a dream. Interpretation of eating fish by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing fish in a dream that is grilled and salty, as this is a sign of travel for the purpose of obtaining knowledge and knowledge, or it may be a sign of accompanying the leader. And from eating grilled fish in a dream, this indicates comfort and a lot of good that will come to the dreamer. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of grilled fish with two aspects of interpretation, it was the response to the prayer or the good that prevails in the dreamer, and in some cases grilled fish can be considered evidence of the punishment that will befall the dreamer. The owner of the dream. And the woman who sees that she is putting a small fish in the flour, this indicates that she will get a little money, but it will bring her great benefit. Seeing fish spines in a dream is enmity and hostility between the dreamer and his family, or it indicates a desire that is not fulfilled except after exhaustion. Salted fish in a dream is a benefit that returns to the fortuneteller in a short time. Interpretation of fish consumption by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi interprets seeing fish in a dream as a reference to women, especially if their number is known. As for seeing fresh fish, it refers to women. And the dream of eating fish in a dream indicates good profits. Whoever sees in a dream that he caught and ate fish, this is evidence of the benefit that comes from his opinion in livelihood. And the dream of a dead fish is an unpleasant dream because it indicates a desire that will not be fulfilled. Eating raw or live fish in a dream is evidence of conquering property or authority, but if the number of fish exceeds four, this is evidence of women and lawful food. Fried fish in a dream indicates responding to an invitation. And a large fish or whale is evidence of great happiness. And when the sky rains grilled fish, this indicates a responsive response and abundance of sustenance. Interpretation of eating fish in a dream for a single woman Seeing fresh fish in a dream is evidence of lawful living. And grilled fish is a victory and good news for singles. Fried fish in a dream is evidence that you spend money on charity and indicates something you did well. Seeing eating raw fish in a dream indicates something useful to her and happens quickly. As for whoever ate raw fish that tastes bad, this indicates his haste in a matter that follows sadness. Interpretation of eating fish in A dream for a married woman Seeing grilled fish in a dream for a married woman means a lot of good and a good event for her that will encourage her soon. Seeing fried fish in a married woman's dream indicates a profitable investment and is followed by hypocrisy. Eating raw fish meat and it tasted delicious. This is a good dream and indicates achieving an interest and benefit. Interpretation of seeing eating fish in a pregnant woman's dream A pregnant woman who sees a lot of fish in a dream indicates that the newborn is a male. However, if she sees one fish in a dream, this indicates that the newborn is a female. In general, seeing fish in a dream is beneficial to its owner in the dream. Therefore, we have presented to you

However, if he sees one fish in a dream, this indicates that the baby is female. In general, seeing fish in a dream is beneficial to its owner in the dream. Therefore, we have presented to you

title: Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq, and interpretation of a dream about surviving an earthquake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about an earthquake: Seeing an earthquake is considered one of the visions that strike the hearts with terror. An earthquake is a natural disaster that leaves large cracks in the nature of the earth. This vision has many meanings that vary based on many considerations, including the earthquake. It may be mild or strong. The earthquake can be at home or throughout the country, etc. Our interest in this article is to examine all the specific cases and signals of a dream about an earthquake occurring in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of a dream about an earthquake in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake. Seeing an earthquake expresses the cracks that happen to a person from time to time, and the vibration that occurs inside him, and it has a major impact on his view of the world. The outside world around him. This vision refers to the psychological conflicts, the vicissitudes of life, and the deterioration that occurred in the inner psychological life before this deterioration was limited to the external nature. The vision of the earthquake also shows the common sadness of all sadness, corruption, tyranny, self-sacrifice, and the abundance of worldly conflicts and competition for fleeting things. And if The dreamer saw the earthquake in his dream, this indicates sharp fluctuations in his life and its transformations that make it necessary for him to move from a state he was in to another state that may not suit him at first. And whoever sees the earthquake and something bad happens to him, this vision indicates that he will be exposed to a serious illness or a conflict in religion or The presence of a huge loss afflicts the dreamer with distress and exhaustion. If a person sees an earthquake accompanied by a disturbance in the sky, this is a sign of suffering and divine punishment, due to the spread of injustice and corruption. Interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream of an earthquake. Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq believes that seeing an earthquake represents an epidemic, destruction, worldly conflicts, forgetfulness of the afterlife, neglect of its affairs, and attachment. With the world and observing its virtues. Seeing an earthquake also indicates panic and terror of the Lord, and fear in the dreamer’s heart of worldly punishments and constant escape and rejection of the idea of ​​confrontation. Seeing an earthquake could be a sign of marital turmoil and disagreements, and frequent quarrels between them and reaching a dead end foretells decisions he may regret. One of the two parties later. This vision also expresses the change of circumstances, the transformation of situations, and the dangerous changes that occur in the person and leave him with strange effects that make him look like another person. If the dreamer witnesses the earthquake, this represents the disease and epidemic that kills everyone, and the dreamer may suffer a share of it. Also, seeing The earthquake indicates the arrival of bad news and a period of turmoil, distress, and miserable deterioration of the situation. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin goes on to say that seeing an earthquake is not a good thing and expresses great losses in resources and lives. This vision symbolizes strife, destruction, wars, strife, and decision-making that leads to conflict. Over matter and fighting over ephemeral things will not benefit the afterlife. Seeing an earthquake also indicates changes that happen to everyone, which make the person believe that time has ended and that the current life is not the life he lived before, people are not the same as they were and the place is not the same as the one that was before.

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about the Messenger without seeing him?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Messenger without seeing him. The dream of the Messenger without seeing him is one of the beautiful dreams that each of us wants to see in his sleep. Once you feel that the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, has visited you in your dream, then this is a great honor for you as a human being without seeing him. What is the interpretation of a dream about the Messenger without seeing him? A dream about the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, is one of the things that makes you confident of your destiny with God (Glory be to Him). ) Even if you were disobedient and his chosen one visited you, this is a sign of your good circumstances in the future, and that a good plant in you will grow one day. If you are sad or worried about the worries and problems of the world that have come back over your head and exhausted your strength, rest assured that all these worries will soon end Very without knowing why it arrived and when it ended so quickly. If you saw the light of Muhammad in your dream and felt his noble and pure breath around you, you will not be lost on the path of truth and guidance even if you do not know your destination at the moment, because tomorrow you will realize the right direction on the path of righteousness that leads you to forgiveness. God and His satisfaction. If you are a person known for your piety and uprightness, and you see the Messenger in your dream, then seeing him is true and the devils cannot be represented in the image of the beloved Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, and your coming to you in any form is evidence of God’s acceptance of your good deeds. What is the interpretation of the dream of the Prophet Without seeing Ibn Shirin? Ibn Sirin said: The Muslim who sees the Messenger of God, whether he is a light or in the form of the human being that God created him with, or someone else, is good news for him to achieve all his dreams and ambitions, and for the sake of God’s pleasure (Glory be to Him) if he is among the people of Piety and faith. If a young woman who has not reached the age of marriage sees it, this is evidence of her superiority, her good relationship with her Lord, and her desire to perform acts of worship, starting with the duties that God has imposed on her. For us to pray. And fasting and performing the Sunnah and austerity that she achieved through her quest to learn about her correct religion from the Qur’an and the books of the Prophet’s Sunnah. Seeing a righteous man in this dream makes him proud of himself and proud of what he does. He often does not make the world his greatest concern, but knows very well that it is fleeting. As for eternity, it is in the afterlife, and he wants to offer himself for what will dwell him in the gardens of bliss with God’s mercy and forgiveness. Seeing him, may God bless him and grant him peace, is evidence of the good reputation that the dreamer enjoyed for his good behavior in following the teachings of Islam that the Noble Messenger brought. If the dreamer is sad and finds The world confined him to what welcomed him, so the Prophet’s visit to him is good news of freedom from distress and its replacement with joy and happiness, and conditions will change much better than they were. Before. What is the interpretation of the dream of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, without seeing a single woman? If the girl is going through a state of sadness because she has not been able to get married for many years after completing her studies and she has become the focus of relatives’ discussion about her and she is tired of the words of pity that make her heart break between the two sides of her, then His visit to her (peace be upon him) in her dream heralds her arrival in goodness and happiness and that God (Glory be to Him) will soon reward her with what she deserves, and bring her the happiness that she seeks and that he does not want. Find with a man a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in my house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in my house in a dream. In the following lines, we will present the interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in my house in a dream according to what has been reported by interpretation scholars and the meanings that follow...Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in my house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman in my house in a dream. It may be a sign of a return to her, and God knows best. UnseenIn the event that a man sees his ex-wife in his home, it may lead to thinking about his ex-wife, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you dream of a divorced woman in your home, this may be a sign of returning to the man, God willing. If the dreamer sees his ex-wife visiting him at home in a dream, this may be A sign of returning to the woman, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-wife chasing me in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. However, seeing my ex-wife in a dream could be a sign of communication with her, and God knows the unseen. When you see a divorced woman, it may be a reference to memories, and God knows the unseen. And if he sees a divorced woman, he may need help, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman combing Her hair in a dream. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of combing her hair in a dream could be a sign of getting rid of problems and worries, God willing. A divorced woman’s hairstyle can also express a request for help from someone, and God knows the unseen. When you see a divorced woman combing her hair in a dream, this may be of help to her. Her family, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees herself in a dream combing her hair, this may be evidence of achieving goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream that I am holding my ex-wife’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am holding my ex-wife’s hand in a dream could be a sign of love, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees herself holding In the hand of her ex-husband in a dream, this may be evidence that she is thinking about getting back together, and God knows the unseen. Holding your ex-husband’s hand can also express nostalgia and memories, and God is Most High and Knowing. If a divorced woman is seen holding her ex-husband’s hand and letting him leave, this may be an indication of the appropriate decision. By divorce, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife calling me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife calling me in a dream may express my regret over the divorce and thinking about returning to him, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees contact with her ex-husband, she may express her thought of returning to him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a man sees his wife My ex is calling, this may indicate regret about the divorce, and God knows the unseen. When I see my ex-husband calling me, this may be a sign of fear, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife laughing at me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream with my ex-wife laughing at me in a dream, it could be a sign of goodness and happiness. God willing. If the dreamer sees the divorced woman laughing out loud, this may lead to a lack of chivalry, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer hears the divorced woman laughing without seeing her, this may lead to good news, and God knows best. When she sees the divorced woman laughing with her ex-wife.

title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman: The pregnancy of a married woman is the happiest news she will hear. It is a dream of hers since she was young, in order to achieve the dream of motherhood, but the vision carries many different meanings, as it is a sign of many livelihoods and her obtaining many benefits, and it may be a sign of her pregnancy. Soon, we will tell you more about the interpretation of the vision through this article. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman: A dream about pregnancy for a married woman who does not have children indicates pregnancy soon and it may be a psychological vision due to her psychological fears regarding this matter. Jurists say that seeing pregnancy shows an important sign of That the woman is pregnant or a big secret that she does not want to reveal, but if the woman works in trade, this is evidence of increasing profits and achieving a lot of profits. Especially if her stomach is large. Seeing the pregnancy and feeling great happiness with it, the jurists interpreted it as an end to anxiety and getting rid of anxiety during the coming period, but if the pregnancy was sad, it means that you are facing many problems and troubles in life. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in The interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman is that it is a sign of abundant nutrition and the soon realization of benefits. However, if the woman is barren and sees pregnancy in her dream, this is an indication of her presence. A great loss that she will suffer in the near future. The vision of pregnancy for a woman suffering from worries and problems, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as consolation after fatigue, comfort after anxiety, and the disappearance of all the problems she is experiencing soon, it is a good vision for her. If a woman sees that the size of her stomach is larger than usual, then this It means a lot of money and food that you will soon have without a curse. Obstacles and traps in life. A stable pregnancy in a woman’s dream is a sign of stability, happiness, and reassurance in life. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream in a dream to get rid of differences between her and her husband, in addition to directing the situation and increasing nutrition. It is one of the promising dreams for the end of life’s worries. If a pregnant woman sees that she is pregnant and does not feel pain or fatigue, it is a vision that symbolizes the passage of this period without exposure to health complications, God willing, and the vision also shows the ease of childbirth and getting rid of problems. . Interpretation of a dream about a boy being born to a married woman. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a boy being pregnant is one of the unwanted visions and portends great anxiety and many responsibilities in life, but if a woman is sad that she is pregnant with a boy, this means a great calamity. Ibn Shaheen saw that the child is being born to a married woman, so he interpreted it as Serious disagreements with the husband, in addition to the hardship of living and going through a period of difficulties and problems. To see a woman pregnant with a son when she is not pregnant in the first place means the renewal of disagreements and the emergence of old problems in her life again, and the birth of a son is a new beginning and an alleviation of worries and concerns. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman She has twins. In interpreting a dream about pregnancy for a woman married to twins, jurists say that it is good and multiplying food for her, in addition to prosperity.

If a woman sees that the size of her stomach is larger than usual, then this It means a lot of money and food that you will soon have without a curse. Obstacles and traps in life. A stable pregnancy in a woman’s dream is a sign of stability, happiness, and reassurance in life. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream in a dream to get rid of differences between her and her husband, in addition to directing the situation and increasing nutrition. It is one of the promising dreams for the end of life’s worries. If a pregnant woman sees that she is pregnant and does not feel pain or fatigue, it is a vision that symbolizes the passage of this period without exposure to health complications, God willing, and the vision also shows the ease of childbirth and getting rid of problems. . Interpretation of a dream about a boy being born to a married woman. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a boy being pregnant is one of the unwanted visions and portends great anxiety and many responsibilities in life, but if a woman is sad that she is pregnant with a boy, this means a great calamity. Ibn Shaheen saw that the child is being born to a married woman, so he interpreted it as Serious disagreements with the husband, in addition to the hardship of living and going through a period of difficulties and problems. To see a woman pregnant with a son when she is not pregnant in the first place means the renewal of disagreements and the emergence of old problems in her life again, and the birth of a son is a new beginning and an alleviation of worries and concerns. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a married woman She has twins. In interpreting a dream about pregnancy for a woman married to twins, jurists say that it is good and multiplying food for her, in addition to prosperity.
